exceptions.exn: In environment q : nat Hq : 0 < q r : nat Hr : r = power q 2 Hr' : 2 <= r n : nat f, e : nat -> nat m : nat i : forall i : nat, i < n -> f i < r j : forall i j : nat, i < j < n -> e i < e j k : m ≲ sum_powers r n f e The term "n" has type "nat" while it is expected to have type "nat -> nat".

original: intros i j k. intros hf he hbound. intros. pose proof (sum_powers_ortho n f e). rewrite H1 in H. rewrite H in H0. apply meet_sum_powers in H0. exists (λ i : nat, f i). split. - rewrite <- H. apply H0. - intros. apply H4 in H6. apply H6. apply H5.
